template: UPDATE airport SET name = "{airports_name}" WHERE ident = "{airports_ident}"
description: An update statement to update the name of the airport.

template: UPDATE airport SET municipality = "{airports_municipality}" WHERE iso_country = "{airports_iso_country}"
description: An update statement to update the municipality of an airport

template: UPDATE airport SET wikipedia_link = "{airports_wikipedia_link}" WHERE ident = "{airports_ident}"
description: An update statement to set the wikipedia link of an airport.

template: UPDATE airport SET home_link = "{airports_home_link}" WHERE name = "{airports_name}"
description: An update statement to set the homepage link of an airport.

template: UPDATE airport_frequencies SET description = "{airport-frequencies_description}" WHERE airport_ident = "{airport-frequencies_airport_ident}";
description: Updates the description of an airport frequency by its airport identifier.

template: UPDATE airport_frequencies SET frequency_mhz = {airport-frequencies_frequency_mhz} WHERE type = "{airport-frequencies_type}";
description: Updates the frequency value for a given frequency type.

template: UPDATE navaids SET name = "{navaids_name}" WHERE ident = "{navaids_ident}";
description: Updates the name of a navigation aid by its identifier.

template: UPDATE countries SET keywords = "{countries_keywords}" WHERE code = "{countries_code}";
description: Updates the keywords field for a given country code.

template: UPDATE regions SET keywords = "{regions_keywords}" WHERE iso_country = "{regions_iso_country}";
description: Updates keywords for all regions in a specified country.

template: UPDATE airport_frequencies SET type = 'TWR' WHERE airport_ident IN ('{airports_ident}','{airports_ident}','{airports_ident}','{airports_ident}');
description: Updates keywords for all regions in a specified country.
